name: Reflection (itch) (T-ReXx)
description:
"Reflection" is a survival horror game developed as a tribute to the monumental horror classic "Silent Hill". It is still in active development with no release window as of yet. I am the only person developing it, and I am still a rather new developer, so it is still unpolished.

The downloadable demo preview features:

  • Two levels
  • No enemies
  • Unity HDRP graphics
  • Silent Hill-inspired gameplay

Note: because of the High Definition Render Pipeline, system requirements may be rather high, and the game might refuse to run or run incorrectly on weaker machines.

NOTE 2: due to unforeseen circumstances (lack of proper testing), the game is prone to gamebreaking bugs and lack of proper player guidance. I will release a fixed version eventually.
